Token.Abstract: Main class used to issue REST requests to the standard Force.com REST API.

Gets or sets the value of the SFOAuthCoordinator instance associated with SFRestAPI requests. Note: If your app inherits from SFNativeRestAppDelegate, or you otherwise manage the account configuration of your app through SFAccountManager, you should not need to set/configure this property, as it's closely aligned with SFAccountManager already.

Gets or sets the value of the SFOAuthCoordinator instance associated with SFRestAPI requests. Note: If your app inherits from SFNativeRestAppDelegate, or you otherwise manage the account configuration of your app through SFAccountManager, you should not need to set/configure this property, as it's closely aligned with SFAccountManager already.

Gets or sets the value of the SFOAuthCoordinator instance associated with SFRestAPI requests. Note: If your app inherits from SFNativeRestAppDelegate, or you otherwise manage the account configuration of your app through SFAccountManager, you should not need to set/configure this property, as it's closely aligned with SFAccountManager already.
The REST API version used for all the calls. This could be "v21.0", "v22.0"... The default value is kSFRestDefaultAPIVersion (currently "v36.0")
The REST API version used for all the calls. This could be "v21.0", "v22.0"... The default value is kSFRestDefaultAPIVersion (currently "v36.0")
The REST API version used for all the calls. This could be "v21.0", "v22.0"... The default value is kSFRestDefaultAPIVersion (currently "v36.0")
Returns the singleton instance of SFRestAPI Dependent on authenticated credentials in SFAccountManager, to properly form up authenticated requests.
Specifies whether the current execution is a test run or not.
Specifies whether the current execution is a test run or not.
Clean up due to host change or logout
Cancel all requests that are waiting to be excecuted
Sends a REST request to the Salesforce server and invokes the appropriate delegate method.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: the SFRestRequest to be sent

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: the delegate object used when the response from the server is returned. This overwrites the delegate property of the request. Returns the SFNetworkOperation through which the network call is actually carried out

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which lists summary information about each Salesforce.com version currently available, including the version, label, and a link to each version's root.
Returns an SFRestRequest which lists available resources for the client's API version, including resource name and URI.
Returns an SFRestRequest which lists the available objects and their metadata for your organization's data.
Returns an SFRestRequest which describes the individual metadata for the specified object.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: object type; for example, "Account"

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which completely describes the individual metadata at all levels for the specified object.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: object type; for example, "Account"

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which retrieves field values for a record of the given type.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: object type; for example, "Account"

Parameter.Name: objectId
Parameter.Abstract: the record's object ID

Parameter.Name: fieldList
Parameter.Abstract: comma-separated list of fields for which to return values; for example, "Name,Industry,TickerSymbol". Pass nil to retrieve all the fields.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which creates a new record of the given type.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: object type; for example, "Account"

Parameter.Name: fields

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which creates or updates record of the given type, based on the given external ID.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: object type; for example, "Account"

Parameter.Name: externalIdField
Parameter.Abstract: external ID field name; for example, "accountMaster__c"

Parameter.Name: externalId
Parameter.Abstract: the record's external ID value

Parameter.Name: fields

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which updates field values on a record of the given type.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: object type; for example, "Account"

Parameter.Name: objectId
Parameter.Abstract: the record's object ID

Parameter.Name: fields

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which deletes a record of the given type.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: object type; for example, "Account"

Parameter.Name: objectId
Parameter.Abstract: the record's object ID

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which executes the specified SOQL query.

Parameter.Name: soql
Parameter.Abstract: a string containing the query to execute - for example, "SELECT Id, Name from Account ORDER BY Name LIMIT 20"

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which executes the specified SOQL query. The result contains the deleted objects.

Parameter.Name: soql
Parameter.Abstract: a string containing the query to execute - for example, "SELECT Id, Name from Account ORDER BY Name LIMIT 20"

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which executes the specified SOSL search.

Parameter.Name: sosl
Parameter.Abstract: a string containing the search to execute - for example, "FIND {needle}"

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest which returns an ordered list of objects in the default global search scope of a logged-in user.
Returns an SFRestRequest which returns search result layout information for the objects in the query string.

Parameter.Name: fieldList
Parameter.Abstract: comma-separated list of objects for which to return values; for example, "Account,Contact".

Token.Abstract: Provides the User-Agent string used by the SDK
Returns the User-Agent string used by the SDK adding the qualifier after the app type
Build a Request that can fetch a page from the files owned by the specified user.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: if nil the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch a page from the list of files from groups that the user is a member of.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: if nil the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch a page from the list of files that have been shared with the user.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: if nil the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch the file details of a particular version of a file.

Parameter.Name: sfdcId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the file

Parameter.Name: version
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the most recent version, otherwise fetches this specific version.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Build a request that can fetch the latest file details of one or more files in a single request.

Parameter.Name: sfdcIds
Parameter.Abstract: The list of file Ids to fetch.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch the a preview/rendition of a particular page of the file (and version)

Parameter.Name: sfdcId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the file

Parameter.Name: version
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the most recent version, otherwise fetches this specific version

Parameter.Name: renditionType
Parameter.Abstract: What format of rendition do you want to get

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: which page to fetch, pages start at 0.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Builds a request that can fetch the actual binary file contents of this particular file.

Parameter.Name: sfdcId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the file

Parameter.Name: version
Parameter.Abstract: The version of the file

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Build a request that can fetch a page from the list of entities that this file is shared to.

Parameter.Name: sfdcId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the file.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Build a request that will add a file share for the specified fileId to the specified entityId

Parameter.Name: fileId
Parameter.Abstract: the Id of the file being shared.

Parameter.Name: entityId
Parameter.Abstract: the Id of the entity to share the file to (e.g. a user or a group)

Parameter.Name: shareType
Parameter.Abstract: the type of share (V - View, C - Collaboration)

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that be can used to create this share.

Token.Abstract: Build a request that will delete the specified file share.

Parameter.Name: shareId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the file share record (aka ContentDocumentLink)

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to delete this share

Token.Abstract: Build a request that can upload a new file to the server, this will create a new file at version 1.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: Data to upload to the server.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name/title of this file.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the file.

Parameter.Name: mimeType
Parameter.Abstract: The mime-type of the file, if known.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A SFRestRequest that can perform this upload.

Token.Abstract: The search term to be sanitized.

Parameter.Name: searchTerm
Parameter.Abstract: The search term to be sanitized.

Token.Abstract: Generate a SOSL search.

Parameter.Name: term
Parameter.Abstract: - the search term. This is sanitized for proper characters

Parameter.Name: objectScope
Parameter.Abstract: - nil to search all searchable objects, or a dictionary where each key is an sObject name and each value is a string with the fieldlist and (optional) where, order by, and limit clause for that object. or NSNull to not specify any fields/clauses for that object

ReturnValue.Abstract: query or nil if a query could not be generated

Token.Abstract: Generate a SOSL search.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable NSString *)SOSLSearchWithSearchTerm:(NSString *)term fieldScope:(nullable NSString *)fieldScope objectScope:(nullable NSDictionary<NSString*,NSString*> *)objectScope limit:(NSInteger)limit

Parameter.Name: term
Parameter.Abstract: - the search term. This is sanitized for proper characters

Parameter.Name: fieldScope
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR the SOSL scope, e.g. "IN ALL FIELDS". if nil, defaults to "IN NAME FIELDS"

Parameter.Name: objectScope
Parameter.Abstract: - nil to search all searchable objects, or a dictionary where each key is an sObject name and each value is a string with the fieldlist and (optional) where, order by, and limit clause for that object. or NSNull to not specify any fields/clauses for that object

Parameter.Name: limit
Parameter.Abstract: - overall search limit (max 200)

ReturnValue.Abstract: query or nil if a query could not be generated

Token.Abstract: Generate a SOQL query.

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: - NSArray of fields to select

Parameter.Name: sObject
Parameter.Abstract: - object to query

Parameter.Name: limit
Parameter.Abstract: - limit count, or 0 for no limit (for use with query locators)

Parameter.Name: where
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR where clause

ReturnValue.Abstract: query or nil if a query could not be generated

Token.Abstract: Generate a SOQL query.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable NSString *)SOQLQueryWithFields:(NSArray<NSString*> *)fields sObject:(NSString *)sObject whereClause:(nullable NSString *)whereClause groupBy:(nullable NSArray<NSString*> *)groupBy having:(nullable NSString *)having orderBy:(nullable NSArray<NSString*> *)orderBy limit:(NSInteger)limit

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: - NSArray of fields to select

Parameter.Name: sObject
Parameter.Abstract: - object to query

Parameter.Name: groupBy
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR NSArray of strings, each string is an individual group by clause

Parameter.Name: having
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR having clause

Parameter.Name: orderBy
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR NSArray of strings, each string is an individual order by clause

Parameter.Name: limit
Parameter.Abstract: - limit count, or 0 for no limit (for use with query locators)

Parameter.Name: where
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR where clause

ReturnValue.Abstract: query or nil if a query could not be generated

Token.Abstract: Send a request you've already built, using blocks to return status.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: the SFRestRequest to be sent

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a SOQL query.

Parameter.Name: query
Parameter.Abstract: the SOQL query to be executed

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a SOQL query that returns the deleted objects.

Parameter.Name: query
Parameter.Abstract: the SOQL query to be executed

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a SOSL search.

Parameter.Name: search
Parameter.Abstract: the SOSL search to be executed

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a global describe.

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a describe on a single sObject.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: the API name of the object to describe.

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a metadata describe on a single sObject.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: the API name of the object to describe.

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a retrieve for a single record.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: the API name of the object to retrieve

Parameter.Name: objectId
Parameter.Abstract: the record ID of the record to retrieve

Parameter.Name: fieldList
Parameter.Abstract: an array of fields on this record to retrieve

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a DML update for a single record.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: the API name of the object to update

Parameter.Name: objectId
Parameter.Abstract: the record ID of the object

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: a dictionary of fields to update.

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a DML upsert for a single record.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: the API name of the object to update

Parameter.Name: externalIdField
Parameter.Abstract: the API name of the external ID field to use for updating

Parameter.Name: externalId
Parameter.Abstract: the actual external Id

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: a dictionary of fields to include in the upsert

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a DML delete on a single record

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: the API name of the object to delete

Parameter.Name: objectId
Parameter.Abstract: the actual Id of the record to delete

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a DML insert.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: the API name of the object to insert

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: a dictionary of fields to use in the insert.

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a request to list REST API resources

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a request to list REST API versions

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a request to get a file rendition

Parameter.Name: sfdcId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the file

Parameter.Name: version
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the most recent version, otherwise fetches this specific version

Parameter.Name: renditionType
Parameter.Abstract: What format of rendition do you want to get

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: which page to fetch, pages start at 0.

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a request to get search scope and order

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Executes a request to get search result layout

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Parameter.Name: fieldList
Parameter.Abstract: comma-separated list of objects for which to return values; for example, "Account,Contact".

Token.Abstract: Executes a request that returns json

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: the HTTP method

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: the request path

Parameter.Name: queryParams
Parameter.Abstract: the parameters of the request (could be nil)

Parameter.Name: failBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error)

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the block to be executed when the request successfully completes

Token.Abstract: Active requests property
Active requests property
Active requests property
Force a request to timeout: for testing only!

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The request to force a timeout on, or nil to grab any active request and force it to timeout

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if we were able to find and timeout the request, NO if the request could not be found
